Script to Check UNIX Requirements 
#!/bin/csh
#4.3 Script to Check UNIX Requirements
set space     = -999
set minspace  = 500
set minmemsun = 256
set minmemirix = 256
set perver = "none"
set node   = `uname -n`
set os     = `uname -s`
set ver    = `uname -r`
set osver  = `uname -sr`
set fver   = `echo $ver | cut -c1 -`
set perver = `perl -v | awk '/version/ {print $5}'`
switch ($os)
  case SunOS:
    set motver=`what /usr/X11*/lib/libXm.a | awk '/Motif/ {print$3}'`
    if      ($fver == 4) then
        set mem = `sysinfo -level brief -show memory | awk '{print $4}'`
        set disks = `mount | awk '{print $3}'`
        set space = `df -a | awk 'NF!=1 {print $(NF-2) }'`
        set bswap=`df | awk '/swap/ {print$2}'`
        @ bswap = ( $bswap / 1000 )
    else if ($fver == 5) then
        set mem = `dmesg | awk '/^mem/ {print $3}' | tr -d "K" | uniq`
        @ mem = ( $mem / 1000 )
        set space = `df  -b | awk '{print $2}'`
        set bswap = `/usr/sbin/swap -s | awk '{print$11}' | tr -d "k"`
        @ bswap = ( $bswap / 1000 )
    endif
   breaksw
   case IRIX:
     set disks = `df | awk '{print $7}'`
     set space = `df | awk '{print $5}'`
     set mem = `hinv -t memory | cut -f4 -d" "`
     set x11ver = `versions x_eoe | awk '/X11R/ {print $1}'`
     set motver = `versions 4Dwm | awk '/Motif/ { printf $2 }' | cut -c1-5`
     set bswap = `swap -ln | awk '/\/swap/ {print$6}' | cut -c1,4`
   breaksw
   default:
     echo "You must have either a Silicon Graphics or Sun to run VICAR"
endsw
echo "Node      OS/Version      RAM Mb  Swap Mb Motif   Perl"
echo "$node     $os $ver        $mem    $bswap  $motver $perver"
